review: Omg this thing is great. I stream everything I ever needed. Just make sure your home wifi is fast enough or it'll overload the system because it's like running we devices streaming at once. So if you have cell phones, tablets and other computers connected it'll get really sloppy. I just use a separate wifi network for it and I can stream in HD all day long
